statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ -8 \\ -4 \\ 27 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -49 \\ 20 \\ 10 \\ -69 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
